technique: Color Doppler and spectral analysis performed where necessary.
findings: Uterus appears unremarkable; endometrial thickness measures 12.1 mm.
Major vessels show mildly heterogeneous waveform on Doppler.
No evidence of DVT; veins compressible with normal flow.
Breast tissue shows isoechoic lesion measuring 16.17 mm.
recommendations: MRI or CT correlation may be helpful.
